2fa.title: Two-factor authentication

trigger_camera.description: Requests camera to take new image.

save_video.name: Save video
save_video.description: Saves last recorded video clip to local file.

filename.name: File name
filename.description: Filename to writable path (directory may need to be included in allowlist_external_dirs in config).

save_recent_clips.description: Saves all recent video clips to local directory with file pattern "%Y%m%d_%H%M%S_{name}.mp4".

file_path.name: Output directory

send_pin.name: Send pin
send_pin.description: Sends a new PIN to blink for 2FA.

pin.name: Pin
pin.description: PIN received from blink. Leave empty if you only received a verification email.

confirm.title: [%key:component::blink::issues::service_deprecation::title%]

Blink update service is deprecated and will be removed.
Please update your automations and scripts to use `Home Assistant Core Integration: Update entity`.
